data.actual_result: Keyboard pops up faintly then dissapears.
data.expected_result: The camera should open without a keyboard popping up then going away.
data.short_description: When you open up the text line on a channel and click the paperclip. You go to "Take Photo or Video"  and the keyboard flashes up and then dissapears.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on the Text line. - Tap on the paperclip. - Tap on "Take Photo or Video"
